short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Customizable Jigsaw Puzzle you can select your own photos, change the number of pieces & more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Customizable Jigsaw Puzzle on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Customizable Jigsaw Puzzle extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Customizable Jigsaw Puzzle icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Customizable Jigsaw Puzzle popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

FEATURES
Drag and drop images from your desktop to create puzzles (firefox/chrome)
Works on ipad!!!
Compatible with all modern browsers.
Simple an clean design.
Infinite number of pieces.
Use any image.
Very light-weight.
Pick images from your desktop to create the puzzle you want
Redirect to another page when the puzzle is solved.
Shuffle the puzzle in on load of the app.
Choose the default number of pieces.
Disable rotation of the puzzle pieces.

HOW TO PLAY?
Solve the jigsaw puzzle to finish

CONTACT

PRIVACY POLICY
